summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5367 lux) and cloud levels (up 226 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12908 lux), cloud levels (up 1692 m), feels like temperature (up 5.4°C), and outside temperature (up 4.6°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 1039.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2120m and 2730m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Changeable conditions.
